EmailTemplate.description: Notifies RS customer that funds have been disbursed
EmailTemplate.name: DOER Partner - Check 65%
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Disbursal__c.Loan__c}'s Solar Loan funds have been disbursed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Disbursal__c.Partner__c},
BlueWave has disbursed {!Disbursal__c.Amount__c} ({!Disbursal__c.Disbursal_Percentage__c}%) via a two party check for {!Disbursal__c.Loan__c}'s Solar Loan. The check was sent to the customer at the following address:
{!Disbursal__c.Billing_Address__c}
Please contact a member of our Partner Support team if they have not received these funds within 7 business days.
If you have not already, please fill out the interconnection form. This can be uploaded by logging in to your BlueWave Solar Loan Portal, going to the Customer and completing the Interconnection Documentation task.
Sincerely, BlueWave Partner Support partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com (888) 817- 2703
